decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s): L1047-6.2-3.1-2001 Rev C7 (Site Wide Key Plan), L1047-6.2-3.1-2009 Rev C7 (External Works: General Arrangements: 05), L1047-6.2-3.1-2010 Rev C6 (External Works: General Arrangements: 06), L1047-6.2-3.1-2011 Rev C4 (External Works: General Arrangements: 07), L1047-6.2-3.1-2012 Rev C5 (External Works: General Arrangements: 08), L1047-6.2-3.1-2025 Rev C3 (External Works Planting Plan: 04), L1047-6.2-3.1-2026 Rev C3 (External Works: Planting Plan: 05), L1047-6.2-3.1-2027 Rev C2 (External Works Planting Plan: 06), L1047-6.2-3.1-2028 Rev C2 (External Works Planting Plan: 07), L1047-6.2-3.1-2035 Rev C5 (External Works Setting Out: 06), L1047-6.2-3.1-2037 Rev C4 (External Works Setting Out: 08), L1047-6.2-3.1-2045 Rev C3 (Details - Steps to Open Open Space), L1047-6.2-3.1-2050 Rev C1 (Details - Kerbs), L1047-6.2-3.1-2051 Rev C4 (Details - hard Landscape 01/02), L1047-6.2-3.1-2052 Rev C4 (Details - Hard Landscape & Sections 02/02), L1047-6.2-3.1-2053 Rev C2 (Details: Furniture 01), L1047-6.2-3.1-2054 Rev C2 (Details: Furniture 02), L1047-6.2-3.1-2055 Rev C5 (Details: Furniture 03), L1047-6.2-3.1-2056 Rev C1 (Details: Soft Landscape), L1047-6.2-3.1-2058 Rev C1 (Details: Play Details 02), L1047-6.2-3.1-2063 Rev C2 (Details - Boundary Treatments 03), L1047-6.2-3.1-2064 Rev C3 (Details - Boundary Treatments 05), L1047-6.2-3.1-2080 Rev P5 (Central Park Re-Design), Z03322-LDA-XX-XX-DE-L-2072 Rev C1 (Play Details 03), Cover letter ref: 35353/A3/AK dated 26 May 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non Material Amendment (s.96a), to allow design alterations to the Central Plaza open space pursuant to planning permission 160793RES 24.05.2016 and 160794VAR dated 09.12.2016 for 'for "Minor material amendment application for variation of conditions 3 (approved drawings), 18 (tree protection), 28 (Lifetime Homes), 31 (BREEAM), 36 (provision of Central Plaza in construction programme) and 42 (non-residential floorspace) of outline planning permission P/2012/0708 dated 13/08/2012 (as amended by P/2014/2142 and P/2014/6303) to facilitate minor changes to building heights, development zones, ground floor uses and floorspaces, phasing, public open space for Phase 6 and tree retention strategy for Phases 5 and 6 of the South Acton Estate regeneration masterplan for 'Outline planning application (reserving Appearance; Means of Access; Landscaping; Layout and Scale for later determination) for the continued regeneration of the South Acton Estate comprising of the demolition of buildings locations specified in the site address (including residential units, 521sqm of retail shops, 2,434sqm of community/ office facilities, hotel, garages and associated areas) and the erection of a maximum of 2,350 residential units, a maximum of 1,050sqm of flexible A1 (retail) / A3 (restaurant and cafe) / B1 (office) / D1 (community) uses, of which 600sqm is to be A1 (retail) use, a further 2,348sqm of D1 (community) /  B1 (office) space (to include a minimum of 926sqm for provision of a community centre and youth club), energy centre, alterations to allotments, re-sited and enhanced open space and play facilities, landscaping, highway works and 1,128 car parking spaces' (original application was EIA Application)'
